tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FanEngagement (
  fan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fan_name VARCHAR(255),
  fan_email VARCHAR(255),
  fan_preference TEXT,
  feedback TEXT,
  loyalty_points INT
);
CREATE TABLE fan_preferences (   fan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   favorite_team VARCHAR(50),   favorite_player VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE feedback (   feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   fan_id INT,   rating INT,   comments TEXT );
CREATE TABLE loyalty_programs (   program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   program_name VARCHAR(50),   discount FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE fan_engagement (   campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   campaign_name VARCHAR(50),   start_date DATE,   end_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE FanEngagement (
    fan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fan_name VARCHAR(50),
    fan_email VARCHAR(50),
    fan_phone VARCHAR(15),
    fan_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE FanPreferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fan_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (fan_id) REFERENCES FanEngagement(fan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FanFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fan_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (fan_id) REFERENCES FanEngagement(fan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LoyaltyPrograms (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    program_description TEXT,
    program_start_date DATE,
    program_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fan_id INT,
    program_id INT,
    join_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (fan_id) REFERENCES FanEngagement(fan_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES LoyaltyPrograms(program_id)
);
